column4: anyone have experience with the thinkpad t510 and the broadband adapter ? To use it i have to boot Windows , turn it on , reboot to ubuntu and then the adapter is visible. After a shutdown it's gone and have to do same procedure again :(
sorry, i've never used a broadband adapter
i'm guessing you mean a usb dongle thing
Wireless works ok , except when do large file transfers ( reported a bug for that )
